commands.name: az networkfabric l2domain create
commands.summary: Create a L2 Isolation Domain resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric l2domain create --nf-id
                                 --resource-group
                                 --resource-name
                                 --vlan-id
                                 [--annotation]
                                 [--location]
                                 [--mtu]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--tags]

commands.name: az networkfabric l2domain delete
commands.summary: Delete the L2 Isolation Domain resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric l2domain delete [--ids]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--resource-group]
                                 [--resource-name]
                                 [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric l2domain list
commands.summary: List all L2 Isolation Domains in the provided resource group or subscription.

commands.name: az networkfabric l2domain show
commands.summary: Show details of the provided L2 Isolation Domain resource.

commands.name: az networkfabric l2domain update
commands.summary: Update the L2 Isolation Domain resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric l2domain update [--annotation]
                                 [--ids]
                                 [--mtu]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--resource-group]
                                 [--resource-name]
                                 [--subscription]
                                 [--tags]

commands.name: az networkfabric l2domain update-admin-state
commands.summary: Enables isolation domain across the fabric or on specified racks.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric l2domain update-admin-state [--ids]
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--resource-ids]
                                             [--resource-name]
                                             [--state {Disable, Enable}]
                                             [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric l2domain wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
